info.name: XDA 2013 Beta - Blue Edition
info.description:
Nothing much , just a simple color change ... Orange is annoying

Remember to select anyone of the "XDA 2013 Beta" theme ,found at bottom left corner in the forum under STYLE CHOOSER.
info.additionalInfo:
Release notes :

V1 :

* Just a simple Font / Title / Link color change

V2 :

* Changed the Top banner so that profile info becomes much clear.
